lines.text: [reading a bullet-riddled note left on a wanted poster]
Lay off Sheriff, or you'll get the same thing - and it won't be no picture.
We didn't get it. It wasn't in the safe.
Whaddya mean, you didn't get it?
I'm telling you we couldn't find it.
And you call yourselves "bad men"! I should have left you where I found you - brandin' calves!
